name: Earigator
description:
Only you can help this poor poor man clean his ears. Stick your trusty Q-Tip deeper and deeper into hit his ear and clean out all the junk! 

---

Features

- High stakes ear cleaning action.

- 3 mini games to clean your Q-Tip

- Guaranteed to make your wife dry heave.

---

Use the arrow keys to move, and X/C to reload your Q-Tip when it gets too heavy

---

feel free to take a look at the full source code here...but beware of bad code smells.
